Spec

  • Validate File
    • checks the validity of uploaded JSON file
  • Tokenize
    • should transform all words to lowercase
    • should remove every special character
  • createIndex
    • should return an Object
    • should not return an array
    • should return true for values "alice" and "wonderland"
    • should return false for values "elie" and "justapose"
    • should return 0 for values "alice" and "rabbit"
    • should return 1 for values "alliance" and "hobbit"
    • should not create index of words not in document
  • storeIndex
    • should return an Object
    • should not return a string
    • should return true for values "falls" and "hole"
    • should return false for values "minimal" and "sucks"
    • should return 0 for values "into" and "of"
    • should return 1 for values "lord" and "powerful"
    • should not have index of words not in document stored
  • getIndex
    • should return an Object
    • should not return an integer
    • should return true for values "alice" and "wonderland"
    • should return false for values "eiie" and "justapose"
    • should return 0 for values "alice" and "rabbit"
    • should return 1 for values "alliance" and "hobbit"
    • should not get index of words not in document
  • searchIndex
    • should return an array
    • should return 1 for search for "alice" in books
    • should return undefined for search for "anja" in books
    • should expect "hole" to be found when searching in "all"
    • should expect "debby" not to be found when searching in "all"
